member.name: M:Infrastructure.Services.Identity.MfaService.GenerateOtpAuthString(System.String,System.String,System.String,Domain.Enums.Integration.TotpAlgorithm,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate TOTP authentication string for use in authenticator apps like Google Authenticator and Authy
member.param: Account identifier like Username or Email Address
Secret Key used to seed TOTP key generation
TOTP algorithm to use | NOTE: Most providers only support SHA1
TOTP code size in numbers to generate | NOTE: Some providers only support 6
Time in seconds for the TOTP code generated to be valid | NOTE: Some providers only support 30
member.returns: Generated TOTP authentication string primarily used to generate a QR Code for registering a TOTP generator
